document_data.name: Theryis
document_data.mainbody: '''Theryis''' was an [[eladrin]] [[Harper agent]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Theryis was a serene and understanding person, in contrast to her brother's personality.
document_data.Activities: Besides being a [[Harper]], Theryis was also the owner and administrator of the [[House of a Thousand Faces]].
document_data.History:
The House of a Thousand Faces was originally a clothing boutique. After the [[Ruining]] of [[1451 DR]], Theryis closed her business and left the city to explore the world. She returned a few years later alongside her brother, both of them now Harper agents. Theryis re-purposed her old business as a tavern, to serve as an undercover base for the Harpers operating in the city. 

As of [[1479 DR]], Theryis was one of the only two official Harper agents operating in Neverwinter. The other one was her brother.

In 1479 DR, Theryis may have aided of group of [[adventurer]]s who were searching for information about the "[[Seldra Tylmarande|Lost Heir]]" of [[Alagondar]].
